name: The Other Side (sinananan)
description:
Hey guys!

Thanks for playing 'The Other Side'! This is my entry to the first GeoJam.

I didn't quite have all week to make this, but I'm proud of what I accomplished in the time I had. I hope you enjoy it.

Controls are WASD or Arrow Keys. X to continue the conversation, Space to switch to the Other Side and back.

Please leave a comment. I really appreciate the feedback, and I try to act on all of it.

NOTE: I missed something with the scaling settings, so you may have to play in full screen. Fortunately, I think it's better that way!

Thanks a lot!
